1624490.name: Inferbito
1624490.description: A girl named Hailey tries to paint a portrait of her long dead sister, but she can't seem to remember her facial features correctly. Determined not to let her sisters memory die with her, she desperately tries to find any remnant to surface memories to remember what she looked like. As she pushes against her laughably finite and fragile human condition, two mysterious rabbits enter her life; one a cute plush bunny who can't stand her own intrusive suicidal thoughts, the other a shadowy hare who won't stop growing & becoming a problematic monster. Both want something from Hailey that's impossible to give. And so, Hailey struggles to preserve.
1624490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
